The 10th anniversary Christmas Lights blue 7-inch is back in the Coldplay Store! Limited quantities are available - head to https://t.co/SWFttEuDnV to order and to check out the full Christmas Lights collection. A https://t.co/mW5hbvwpO4
Thanks to every single one of you who voted here. Once again, you’ve proven yourselves The Greatest. Thank you for letting us ride on your wave. Love c, g, w, j & p #MTVEMA https://t.co/JZ3ddcEnT1

To celebrate Christmas Lights' 10th anniversary, the song is getting its first ever physical release! The blue 7" single is out December 4th. 
Pre-order it now, with an exclusive artwork print, from https://t.co/SWFttEuDnV - where you'll also find new Christmas Lights merch. A https://t.co/srxj1vKGBo

If you're in the US, tune in to #EveryVoteCounts tonight at 9pm / 8pm CT on @CBS to celebrate the value of every citizen’s right to vote. The event will then be shown worldwide across streaming platforms on Friday at 9pm ET. More info: https://t.co/j76vdm7p2F. A https://t.co/4lxuepdgRI

Our friends @TheOceanCleanup have made these supercool sunglasses entirely from ocean plastic. Each pair sold will fund their efforts to clear the Great Pacific Plastic Patch. Order your pair here: https://t.co/cZj8hjypwo.  Love c, g, w, j & p https://t.co/i13Cdqqtez

Thankyou @MarcusRashford for your fantastic campaign to persuade the UK govt to supply free meals to vulnerable kids during school holidays. 

If you’re a UK resident, please add your voice here: https://t.co/NYEAeVsRja

Love Coldplay

#EndChildFoodPoverty

Photo prints from the band's @RoyalAlbertHall show on July 1st 2014 by @christiegoodwin are available now from https://t.co/5iXulChdET, with proceeds to this fabled London venue, closed since March. PH https://t.co/dS0BU6lWbe

The band's December 2014 performance at London's BBC Radio Theatre is being made available as part of a celebration of 50 years of live music at @BBCRadio2.

Listen out for the performance on Radio 2 and on @BBCSounds from 1st November. A #R2InConcert50 https://t.co/5rnZzhjSYP

Chris will participate in the #EveryVoteCounts broadcast on October 29. There will also be footage from the band’s recent Instagram live set which launched the initiative. It’s a non-partisan event to provide US citizens with the info they need to vote. https://t.co/2X2eqSPyXs A https://t.co/D9LW6O3uuU

Hello everyone, we’re playing a short live set on our Instagram tomorrow at 5pm BST (6pm CET / 12pm ET / 9am PT) in support of @GlblCtzn's Every Vote Counts campaign. Hope to see you there. Love c, g, w & j #EveryVoteCounts https://t.co/xiIVsr6q2b

We’re so thankful to @coldplay for generously donating the original artwork for #AHeadFullOfDreams ☁️🌈  to support our global #Coronavirus response 💚🌍 Here it is hanging in @bonhams1793 ready for the hammer to fall. Auction goes live at 1pm today! 👉 https://t.co/xt6iXbAnoB https://t.co/qv3gmCsXsT
This put a HUGE smile on my face, Nandi 😊 Absolutely brilliant. Love WC X https://t.co/kHSlh13ViT
